body.name: Soularge Women's Plus Size Winter Thicken Puffer Coat with Detachable Hood
features: Fabric type Material -- Shell: 100% polyester; Lining: 100% polyester

SUPERIOR WARMTH & NO HEAVY -- Quilted with high compressible and washable synthetic fiber, this hooded plus-size winter coat locks the heat efficiently without the extra heavyweight. It keeps you warm and moves easily in winter . Furthermore, the quilted hood, stand collar, and ribbed sleeve cuff help against chilly air outdoor.

KEEP YOU DRY CONSTANTLY -- This warm women's plus-size coat chose the outer fabric with 3000mm waterproof finish and transparent membrane that defend against the snow and light rain and keep you dry and comfortable.

PRACTICAL HOOD AND POCKETS -- Full length zipper attached on the front closure placket. It enhanced warmth of this plus-size puffer coat in winter. Button snap side pockets keep your valubles safe, the fleece pocket lining could warm your hands at the same time.
FLATTERING SILHOUETTE FOR PLUS -- Tailored to plus women shapely figure, this ladies plus size winter coat are also excellent in both fit and comfort, no bulky and shapeless.

WEARING FLEXIBLE FOR WINTER OUTDOOR -- This plus-size women's coat is made ultra-warm and lightweight. It move flexibly and is perfect for those who love outdoor activities, like hiking, traveling, skiing, snowboarding, camping, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stay dry and cozy The effectiveness of waterproofing depends on the quality of the coating and the design of the garment. Our plus size womens winter coats utilize a high-quality waterproofing coating, which effectively shields the wearer from outside moisture. These winter puffer jackets are also specifically designed for a comfortable fit, preventing any water from seeping in through gaps or openings in the fabric. This creates a reliable waterproof barrier that keeps you warm, comfortable, and dry, even in the most extreme weather conditions.

Warm Faux fur Detachable faux fur with deep hood keep the wind out efficiently, protect your face from the frostbite. Handwarmer Fleece lined handwarmer pocket and windproof elastic sleeve cuff provide much warmth for your hands Adjust waist Waist designed with button snap band to adjust your fit, make it won't be bulky in the winter

Soularge Women's Plus Size Winter Thicken Puffer Coat with Detachable Hood This plus size women's winter jacket from Soularge is designed to keep you stylish and cozy in the coldest weather. The soft and breathable material ensures maximum comfort while the chic design flatters your figure all season long. Available in a range of sizes, you can find your perfect fit and make a statement this winter. 1. CELEBRATE YOUR FIGURE Strut your stuff in confidence in clothing that’s made for your body. Specifically designed to give plus size women better winterwear options, this hooded coat is available in sizes 1X to 6X. Our sizing is based on the body shape and size of a large number of people in the U.S. to ensure that we get a standard measurement. This plus size winter coat is perfect for thick and curvy ladies, as well as pregnant moms. 2. Cold defender Stay warm and stylish this winter with our collection of coats. Our windproof hoods and ribbed cuffs keep out the chill, while our plush fleece-lined pockets will keep you cozy. Our coats are filled with premium insulation for maximum warmth and comfort. Find your perfect fit in our women's plus size coats and stay cozy this season. 3. Wear it anywhere: Look as good as you feel with these stylish jackets. Choose from black, army green, navy blue, and wine. These modern colors and the flattering cut makes the plus size jacket look amazing paired with turtlenecks, sweaters, jeans, and shirts.Made for everyone from students to outdoor explorers, this is a jacket you can use whenever your step out the door. Wear it while you’re out for a grocery run, commuting to the office, or exploring snowy landscapes. 4. Size chose: Check the size chart carefully, as sizing may vary across brands. Choose the size that best fits your measurements, taking into account height and weight. Read customer reviews to see how other customers found the sizing. This can be especially helpful if someone has a similar body type to you. 5.Wash care: Machine washable, hand washable, low-temperature drying, do not bleach, wash dark and light-colored garments separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and Roomy
reviews.reviewText: Warm and roomy for a "fluffy" gal. Not too tight or heavy. Bought it a size bigger for sweaters and hoodies underneath. 1st time I got it the right pocket was torn. Returned and easily got a replacement. Love, love, love ❤️ my coat. Just in time for this winter blast of weather ❄️ 🌨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this coat based off the customer reviews and it didn’t disappoint. It fits great with extra room to put in a sweater and it’s super warm. Love this coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great jacket, terrible zipper
reviews.reviewText: The jacket itself is amazing! Super warm, and the color is great. The only downside is the zipper. It feels very cheap and it’s hard to get zipped. Overall, I’d recommend the jacket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a nice warm coat
reviews.reviewText: The fit excellent, love the inner hidden pockets, warm but not bulky, love the color and fit. Satisfied !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very warm coat. Just the right fit. You may want to order a size up from your regular size, just to make sure you have room. I have received a lot of compliments on the coat already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very poor quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this at the tail end of last winter and it was great for a few weeks. The last ti.e I wore it the zipper broke. I was able to mend it on my own, but I pulled it out of the closet and the seams were all coming apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love this coat, but it’s falling apart.
reviews.reviewText: A plus size coat that fits like a dream, so so comfortable, warm, nice and long, love the cuffs on the sleeves and the detachable fur/hood, looks fantastic - however, my coat is falling apart. I’ve had it a year, worn for 5-6 months. A button on the side has fallen off, both pockets have come undone on the sides, there is a hole in the bottom of one side pockets so large my phone falls through it, so I don’t use that pocket anymore. I’ve been meaning to stitch these back up, but I’m not much of a mender, so I’ve not gotten around to it. If it was better constructed, I would give this coat 10/5 stars, I just wish it would last me longer than 1.5 winters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat. I'm in Minnesota and although we only had a few cold days this winter, it was below zero and this coat kept me toasty. I did add a drawstring to the hood so that it wouldn't blow off of my head on those windy cold days.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this coat soft and cozy
reviews.reviewText: Love the coat...arrived timely....ordered 1X...2X would have fit baggy...so 1X better ...nice coat ..good price....i do not have any complaints

Le manteau est parfait, sauf ce qui concerne l'envoie il est envoyé dans un petit sac pour la grandeur du manteau c'est pas fort car il arrive vraiment vraiment toute froissé alors je suis obligé de le défroisser.
Coat fits perfectly only draw back is the faux fir on the hood does not sit properly.
Well it’s too small but that’s my fault. The coat is beautiful.lovely details and looks very expensive. Lightweight too.
It was a gift.The recipient loved it.She always finds sleeves are to short.But this coat was perfect.
